episodes.title: Chapter 10: Hostile Takeover
episodes.summary:
In this episode, Project Cyclops takes us to Vivian Lobdow's first board meeting as the head of the center.
 
Cast List:
 
Narrator - Lee Pace
Dr. John Kinsler - Denis O'Hare
Katie Reed - Brynn Langford
Vivian Lobdow - Callie Schuttera
Lucas - Nathan Wallace
Emily - Ellyn Jameson
Martin - David Marlowe
Ray - Zach Crowley
Robert - Derrick Lemos
Daniel - Ricky Dillon
Chet - KC Wayland
Charlie - Miguel Lopez
Marcus - Zach Crowley
Pastor Mike - Johnny Ferro
Lucie - Michelle Visage
Jamison Billings - Casey Adler
Leah - Ellyn Jameson
 
Written by Christopher Bloodworth and Jimmy Juliano
 
Directed and produced by Alex Aldea and Victor Figueroa
 
Music composed by Andrew Joslyn and Alex Aldea.
 
Live Strings performed by Andrew Joslyn.

Here is the script.

This episode is sponsored by Shudder. Use offer code "darkestnight" for a free month.
